name: Crown Thief (Working Title)
description:
An early prototype for an action-puzzle platformer. Although the player can't jump very high, there are pipes throughout the levels which conserve the player speed as he falls in, sending him flying to great heights as he exits the other end.
The controls:

  • Left / Right Arrows - Move
  • Up Arrow - Enter Doorway
  • Down Arrow - Drop Through Platforms
  • Spacebar - Jump

I am also looking for an artist to help take the visuals to the next level - whether that means taking the art in a different direction entirely or just expanding on what I have.

Let me know what you think or if you have any suggestions down below. Thanks for playing!
